Name: Frequency of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' compared to 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that proceed to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' after 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities per case
Frequency of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' followed by 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all review-related activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases where 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' does not happen

Name: Average number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' before a 'SW-EIC Major Revision' decision
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Percentage of cases with 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' leading to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities that precede 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' in the most common process variant
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' followed by any activity within 3 days
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' in completed reviews
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' performed by each sender
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities grouped by the last value of sender

Name: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' in cases that result in 'SW-EIC Accept'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' in cases with 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities in cases that exceed average review time
